resources.string: This is an Android-based platform application tailor-made for families with children who is able to easily query and read common plant knowledge outside of school time as well as to provide a set of entertaining planting plans to cultivate children with hands-on ability, increase the interest in acquiring knowledge, and even improve the closeness of the parent-child relationship.

The target audience for this app are families with children. The expected range of age is at 12 to 15, because children of this age group are in the enlightenment stage where they begin to acquire external knowledge and become interested, but they often cannot complete a long-term job independently. Therefore, stimulating the curiosity of children of this age is the main focus and motivation of the app.
Unwilling to lonely and mediocre, the pursuit of struggle and glory.
Find a plant by inputting any information of the plant, such as name, water need, harvest cycle. Then the detailed information is provided.
Recognize the plant by taking or uploading the pictures.
Make your own planting plan, we will help you to record the whole process, and remind you to water on time.
According to your planting check-in record, when reaching a certain number, you will get the corresponding medal reward.
1. Leaves with brown spots, holes, nibbled edges
1. Water the plants usually but less often
1. Move the plants to the windowsill
